metadata.title: CVE-2023-39929 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Uncontrolled search path in some Libva software maintained by Intel(R)before version 2.20.0 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enableescalation of privilege via local access.

criterions.comment: libva package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
